about_the_game:
Welcome to the realm of the Isles!

Farming Isles is an isometric farming simulator where you are in control of designing optimal crop growth for maximum profit. Each Isle is configured to have its own set of perks that differ from one another. Construct the Farming Isles however you wish.

DEMO GAMEPLAY

Here you will experience what the basic requirements to keep a sustainable farm functioning by living in the realm of the Isles.

  • Choose what type of Isles to build
    With 2 different Isle types, that are built in predetermined locations

  • Grow your crops

    Choose from 6 different crops to grow and maintain

  • Upgrade

    Increase your structures upgrade level to hold more resources

  • Profit

    Sell the crops grown or the structures you've built to gain $$$

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04
  • Processor: Dual core 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or comparable (or anything newer)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The older the hardware decreases performance. Ideal to have hardware closer to the recommended specs.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04
  • Processor: Quad core 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or comparable (or anything newer)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure to have the latest graphics drivers installed
